### Data Import 

```{r}
library(readr)
Vgames <- read_csv("~/Downloads/184 project/Video_Game_Sales_as_of_Jan_2017.csv")
View(Vgames)

steam2 <- read_csv("~/Downloads/184 project/steam-store-games/steam.csv")
View(steam2)
```

### Data Inspections

```{r}
head(Vgames)
str(Vgames)


head(steam2)
str(steam)
```


### Clean steam2
```{r}

steam2clean <-
  steam2 %>%
  select(name,positive_ratings,negative_ratings,average_playtime,price)
```

### left_join
```{r}

steamVgames2 <-
  Vgames %>%
  left_join(steam2clean,by=c("Name"="name"))

View(steamVgames2)
```


### Clean steamVgames2
```{r}
steamVGclean <-
  steamVgames2 %>%
  filter(average_playtime != ".",Critic_Score != ".")
View(steamVGclean)
```
